text: Arman Kirakossian (; 10 September 1956 – 6 July 2019) was an Armenian diplomat and historian. At the time of his death in July 2019, he was Ambassador of Armenia to the United Kingdom since November 2018. He was also Ambassador of Armenia to the Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe (OSCE), as well as Greece (1994–1999), the United States (1999–2005) and Austria (2011–2018). He was acting Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1992 to 1993. Kirakossian was born in Yerevan. He died on 6 July 2019 in London, at the age of 62. ==References== Category:2019 deaths Category:1956 births Category:Ambassadors to the United States Category:Armenian politicians Category:Armenian historians Category:Ambassadors to the United Kingdom Category:21st-century Armenian people
title: Arman Kirakossian
